subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Steve Francis reappeared at the Knicks’ training center Monday morning, and for the second time in a year, he joined a team in disarray, with no clear sense of where or how — or if — he fits in.
snippet: Steve Francis reappeared at the Knicks’ training center Monday morning, and for the second time in a year, he joined a team in disarray, with no clear sense of where or how — or if — he fits in.
